overview: This documentation plan provides an overview of the workdir/ML-Models project, including its architecture, design, and implementation. It covers key aspects such as system architecture, core workflows, and component interactions.

docs.title: Introduction to ML-Models
docs.description: This document provides a comprehensive overview of the ML-Models project, including its goals, objectives, and key features.
docs.prerequisites: Basic understanding of machine learning concepts
docs.goal: Understand the project's purpose and scope

docs.title: System Architecture
docs.description: This document describes the system architecture of the ML-Models project, including the relationships between different components.
docs.goal: Understand how the system is designed and implemented

docs.title: Core Workflows and Data Flows
docs.description: This document explains the core workflows and data flows of the ML-Models project, including how data is processed and transformed.
docs.goal: Understand how the system processes and transforms data

docs.title: Component Interactions
docs.description: This document describes how different components of the ML-Models project interact with each other, including APIs and interfaces.
docs.goal: Understand how components interact and exchange data

docs.title: Getting Started Guide
docs.description: This document provides a step-by-step guide on how to get started with the ML-Models project, including setting up the environment and running the code.
docs.prerequisites: Basic understanding of machine learning concepts
docs.goal: Be able to run and test the code
